abstract: Several marketers that were on last year’s Oscar broadcast are returning for 2010, among them Hyundai Motor America, Microsoft and J.C. Penney.
snippet: Several marketers that were on last year’s Oscar broadcast are returning for 2010, among them Hyundai Motor America, Microsoft and J.C. Penney.
lead_paragraph: As the parade of so-called big events on television continues — brought to you by, as the saying goes, a lengthy list of blue-chip advertisers — the marketer line-up for the ABC broadcast of the Academy Awards on March 7 is coming into focus.

headline.main: Winter Games Not Yet Done, but Oscar Is on Horizon for Madison Avenue
